snippet.title: Frostpunk 2 | Date Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
The day has finally come - we are ready to announce the release date of Frostpunk 2! 

Pre-order Digital Deluxe Edition with -10% and play beta in April | https://re.11bits.com/pyx 
Follow #Frostpunk 2 on Twitter/X | https://twitter.com/frostpunkgame

Frostpunk 2 is coming to PC and through PC Games Pass on July 25, 2024.

Pre-orders available now! The Digital Deluxe Edition (-10%), which is also available for pre-order starting today, offers access to a seven-day beta in April that consists of part of the game’s sandbox mode, among other things.

The Digital Deluxe Edition contents:
❄️ Base game
❄️ Seven-day beta access to part of the Sandbox mode in April
❄️ Three paid post-release DLCs
❄️ Exclusive access to the story mode 72 hours before the official release
❄️ “Warm Flesh” digital novella, an enticing excerpt from the upcoming 
❄️ Frostpunk book anthology
❄️ Digital artbook & soundtrack

#TheCityMustNotFall
